dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
C. Cortes
C.J. Burges
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a collection of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each representing a single digit from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST LeCun dataset
